author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

A de-reference of a Ref which causes a read from the source now triggers the delayed get signal and the source read signal.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. A simple test running the Tracer shows the new output.

resolves #47781
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1390
title: Make delayed get signal work with Refs
